result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L. Sims

records.addlTxt:
03:34 PM   State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant, Anthony L. Sims, appeared with Attorney Hans Peter Koesser.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Attorney Koesser advises the Court that the State just made an offer and he is requesting an adjournment so the DE may obtain his license. Court adjourns.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Notice of assignment of judge returned. Moved, left no address. Unable to forward. Return to Sender.

Defendant, Anthony L. Sims, appeared with Attorney Hans Peter Koesser.  Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
on Petition for Appointment of Attorney  - Attorney Hans Koesser
Preliminary hearing on July 28, 2022 at 09:15 am.

01:25 PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 09:15 am..  Cash bond continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry).  Atty Koesser appointed Advocate Counsel today. rb

and Order.  
Forwarded to Intake Court.

records.addlTxt: DEF turned in PE for APPT of ATTY; placed in CRML CLRKS bin

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne and Attorney Daniel Deida appeared for the State. Defendant Anthony L. Sims in court.  Clerk: PT
  DE is not eligible for SPD and advocate counsel paperwork was given to the DE.  DE waives time limits and time limits are tolled for cause.  Bond continues.  Status Conference scheduled July 12, 2022 at 1:00 PM.
Status conference on July 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.

01:53 PM   State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.   Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Christopher Bub.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 08:15 am. $500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). mi
